tool_description: With this app, you can easily convert Japanese text to voice
name: Anime Voice Waifu Ai Api
title: Anime Voice Waifu Ai Api

api_list.name: Get Speaker List
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-voice-waifu-ai-api.p.rapidapi.com/speaker"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-voice-waifu-ai-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-voice-waifu-ai-api.p.rapidapi.com/speaker"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-voice-waifu-ai-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Voice
